content.query:
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://southridgedatalake01.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/Customers',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;

SELECT count(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://southridgedatalake01.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/Customers',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;


SELECT count(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://southridgedatalake01.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/Actors',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows

SELECT count(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://southridgedatalake01.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/Movies',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://southridgedatalake01.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/MovieActors',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows
